findings.rationale: An indefinite term may lead to perpetual obligations, increasing the risk of unintentional breaches and ongoing liabilities for the Recipient.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship.

findings.rationale: The ambiguity in defining what constitutes confidential information may lead to disputes over what can be disclosed or used.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public information, whether oral, written, or electronic, disclosed by Discloser to Recipient.

findings.rationale: Restrictions on disclosure without written consent could hinder the Recipient's ability to conduct necessary business operations and collaborations.
findings.evidence_quote: Not disclose to any third party without prior written consent.
